hero.title: Driving the Safe Future of AI in Colombia
hero.description: At AI Safety Colombia, we are dedicated to building a future where AI benefits everyone safely and ethically. Our mission is to train leaders, foster critical research, and raise awareness about the importance of AI safety.

aiFundamentals.title: AI Safety Fundamentals
aiFundamentals.description: We facilitate courses developed by BlueDot Impact, offering solid training in AI safety fundamentals.

expertTalks.title: Expert Talks and Dinners
expertTalks.description: We organize exclusive events with AI field leaders, providing unique networking and learning opportunities.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Stay tuned for our upcoming AI Safety Fundamentals courses and expert events. Follow us on social media to not miss any opportunity.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Be part of a network of innovators committed to responsible AI development in Colombia. Join our WhatsApp group to stay up to date with our activities and connect with other safe AI enthusiasts.

footer.copyright: Â© 2024 AI Safety Colombia. Building a safe and innovative future.
